content.text: The code repository located at /tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_min_20260129/signer is currently written in Java 8. Please migrate the entire codebase to Java 17.

reasoningText.text:
I need to migrate a Java project from JDK 8 to JDK 17. Let me start by exploring the repository structure to understand what we're working with.

My approach will be:
1. First, examine the repository structure
2. Look at the pom.xml or build configuration to understand the current Java version settings
3. Update the Java version in the build configuration
4. Run `mvn clean verify` to see if there are any compatibility issues
5. Fix any issues that arise
6. Verify the build passes

Let's start by exploring the directory.

content.text: I'll help you migrate this Java project from JDK 8 to JDK 17. Let me start by exploring the repository structure and understanding the current configuration.

Directory structure displayed in console.
Directory tree: /tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_min_20260129/signer

File content displayed in console.
Content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 https://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

    <parent>
        <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
        <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-parent</artifactId>
        <version>2.2.4.RELEASE</version>
        <relativePath/> <!-- lookup parent from repository -->
    </parent>
    <groupId>com.ffsec</groupId>
    <artifactId>signer</artifactId>
    <version>1.0.0</version>
    <name>signer</name>
    <description>SpringBoot library for automatic and secure http request's signing using Spring RestTemplate</description>

    <properties>
        <java.version>8</java.version>
    </properties>

    <dependencies>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web</artifactId>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-test</artifactId>
            <scope>test</scope>
            <exclusions>
                <exclusion>
                    <groupId>org.junit.vintage</groupId>
                    <artifactId>junit-vintage-engine</artifactId>
                </exclusion>
            </exclusions>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-aspects</artifactId>
            <version>5.2.2.RELEASE</version>
        </dependency>
    </dependencies>

    <build>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <artifactId>maven-jar-plugin</artifactId>
                <configuration>
                    <excludes>
                        <exclude>com/ffsec/signer/SignerApplication.class</exclude>
                        <exclude>application.properties</exclude>
                    </excludes>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>
    </build>
</project>

         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 https://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

    <parent>

        <version>2.7.18</version>
        <relativePath/> <!-- lookup parent from repository -->
    </parent>
    <groupId>com.ffsec</groupId>
    <artifactId>signer</artifactId>
    <version>1.0.0</version>
    <name>signer</name>
    <description>SpringBoot library for automatic and secure http request's signing using Spring RestTemplate</description>

    <properties>
        <java.version>17</java.version>
    </properties>

    <dependencies>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web</artifactId>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-test</artifactId>
            <scope>test</scope>
            <exclusions>
                <exclusion>
                    <groupId>org.junit.vintage</groupId>

                </exclusion>
            </exclusions>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-aspects</artifactId>
        </dependency>
    </dependencies>

    <build>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <artifactId>maven-jar-plugin</artifactId>
                <configuration>
                    <excludes>
                        <exclude>com/ffsec/signer/SignerApplication.class</exclude>
                        <exclude>application.properties</exclude>
                    </excludes>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>
    </build>
</project>

Excellent! The migration from Java 8 to Java 17 has been completed successfully. The `mvn clean verify` command passed without any errors. 

Here's what I did to migrate the codebase:

1. **Updated the Java version** in `pom.xml` from `8` to `17`
2. **Upgraded Spring Boot** from version `2.2.4.RELEASE` to `2.7.18` (the latest 2.x version that supports Java 17 and maintains backward compatibility)
3. **Removed the explicit version** for `spring-aspects` dependency, allowing Spring Boot's dependency management to handle the correct version

The build completed successfully with:
- All source files compiled successfully with Java 17
- All tests passed (1 test run, 0 failures, 0 errors, 0 skipped)
- JAR artifact created successfully

The migration is complete and the project now runs on JDK 17.
